name: Call of Duty Endowment
description:
Help veterans find quality jobs with a donation to the Call of Duty Endowment. Your donation will be distributed in grants to only the most efficient veterans charities that pass a rigorous audit to earn the Endowment's 'Seal of Distinction.'

1 player

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
